dungeonadventure

Class Space

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeonadventure.Space
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Nameable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Space
extends java.lang.Object
implements Nameable, java.io.Serializable
    A space/location. Space has a map of possible next Spaces (places to move into). Space can also contains items.
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
